title: New: Alicks – Outside
body:
Well this is rather beautiful.

**Alicks** aka Alex Fredericksburg describes her ambition as to ‘make chill music’, and new track _Outside_ is definitely chill. There’s a huge amount to be admired here, from her stunning vocals, to the otherworldly atmosphere she conjures up, her Soundcloud is littered with glittering, undiscovered gems.
